document_data.name: House of Moonlight
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the House of Moonlight
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Moonlight''' was a temple to [[Selûne]] the Moonmaiden found in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Location: The House of Moonlight lay on the far east side of the city.
document_data.History:
During the [[Time of Troubles]] in the [[1358 DR|Year of Shadows, 1358 DR]], the deity [[Torm]] resided at [[Temple of Torm's Coming|his temple]] in Tantras. Torm's zealous priests began persecuting followers of other faiths in the city as "unbelievers". <ref group="note">It is not known if or how the House of Moonlight was affected by this religious persecution.

Nevertheless, the House of Moonlight remained active through to [[1367 DR]] and past [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Around 1358 DR, the temple provided healing to all who required it, even those who did not worship the goddess. However, they would not accede to repeated requests.
document_data.Inhabitants: In [[1358 DR]], the temple was led by High Priest [[Pellar Thalangrim]], with nine priests and sixteen lay-followers.
